name: Worddate
description:
Inspired by the viral hit Wordle, this provides the game you know and love for your Playdate. 

This project is not affiliated with Josh Wardle or the New York Times. This project is using the same word list as the current NYT version of the game though.

This is an early, barebones build that I plan to improve going forward.

Please message me with any comments, thoughts, or bugs!

Roadmap (generally in the order I plan to tackle things):

  • save/load data so you can take your time to work throughout the day
  • crank support for keyboard navigation
  • keyboard UI to show letter hints
  • stat tracking - streak/win/etc
  • a basic how-to page
  • animations for confirming a word
  • better colors for maybe/correct words?
  • prettier title card
  • animated title card
  • replay a previous day's word!
  • QR code to copy/paste share text (if possible?)
